sub_fields.label: Internal Link
sub_fields.name: internal_link
sub_fields.instructions: Please select a page or a post link from the list below.

sub_fields.label: Anchor Text Link
sub_fields.name: anchor_link
sub_fields.instructions: Please start your anchor text link with a hashtag, e.g. #form

sub_fields.label: External Link
sub_fields.name: external_link
sub_fields.instructions: Start your external link with https:// to open the third party website in a new tab properly.

sub_fields.label: Outline Color
sub_fields.name: outline_color
sub_fields.instructions: Adjusts the outline color for the button.

sub_fields.label: Show Related Content
sub_fields.name: show_related_content
sub_fields.instructions: If checked related content and experts will be rendered.

sub_fields.label: Include Image
sub_fields.name: include_image
sub_fields.instructions: If checked an image will be rendered above the content.

sub_fields.label: Text Color
sub_fields.name: text_color_override
sub_fields.instructions: Use this to adjust the text color when using a light or dark background.

sub_fields.label: Tab Background
sub_fields.name: tab_background
sub_fields.instructions: When an image is added this will become an overlay. So, use transparency.

sub_fields.label: Experts
sub_fields.name: experts
sub_fields.instructions:
Select team members you would like to show in this area. There is no limit to how many you select.
If left empty all experts will be shown.

sub_fields.label: Include Content
sub_fields.name: include_content
sub_fields.instructions: If checked content block will be rendered.

sub_fields.label: Text Alignment
sub_fields.name: text_alignment
sub_fields.instructions: Sets the text alignment inside the tab.

sub_fields.label: Include Buttons
sub_fields.name: include_buttons
sub_fields.instructions: If checked buttons will be rendered.

sub_fields.label: Internal Link
sub_fields.name: internal_link
sub_fields.instructions: Please select a page or a post link from the list below.

sub_fields.label: Anchor Text Link
sub_fields.name: anchor_link
sub_fields.instructions: Please start your anchor text link with a hashtag, e.g. #form

sub_fields.label: External Link
sub_fields.name: external_link
sub_fields.instructions: Start your external link with https:// to open the third party website in a new tab properly.

sub_fields.label: Outline Color
sub_fields.name: outline_color
sub_fields.instructions: Adjusts the outline color for the button.

sub_fields.label: Include Video
sub_fields.name: include_video
sub_fields.instructions: If checked video will be rendered next to the content.

sub_fields.label: Video
sub_fields.name: video
sub_fields.instructions: Please use only mp4 videos. This will allow for maximum browser compatibility.
